>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.UVNOjH2ERlQjcGnU]{Zenith Revelation}

When you’re fully graviton-attuned, you can release a wave of crushing gravitational power as a standard action. This revelation affects creatures in a 30-foot cone. Each affected creature takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 2 solarian levels you have and is knocked @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone}. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage and negates the @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj]{Knockdown} effect. In addition, ground in the affected area becomes difficult terrain. At 17th level, a creature that fails the save also becomes exhausted.

Source AP #35 pg. 53
